content:
The chunk adds a "Help" menu item with a toggle for balloon help within the EntryScaleGroup widget's menubar configuration.

menubar.addmenu('Help', 'EntryScale Group Help Operations')
        self.toggleBalloonVar = tk.IntVar()
        self.toggleBalloonVar.set(0)
        menubar.addmenuitem('Help', 'checkbutton',
                            'Toggle balloon help',
                            label = 'Balloon Help',
                            variable = self.toggleBalloonVar,
                            command = self.toggleBalloon)
